https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3FGGJh5S9G29YGIRYqe3zca40yL.jpg After being forced into early retirement, former detective Jeff Jackson returns to a quiet life on Martha's Vineyard. Quiet, at least, until a body washes up and he's drawn back into crime solving. A Beautiful Place to Die: A Martha's Vineyard Mystery
